name: The Dragons of Elion
description:
Your old Friend Greg asks you for Help.

He looking for a Fairy Tale, but he needs you and your friends, to search for the truth that is hidden in the deep of dungeons.....

This is my first Game. Generel, i am a newbie in the use of RPG Maker.

I made "The Dragons of Elion" for the IGMC 2017 and i am glad, that i joined the Competition. Hoping that some people enjoy my Game and i am pleased of any comments.

I will continue the Work on the Game, after the Contest is finished.

Currently there are 3 different "Endings" which I will then expand.

I already habe detailed plans for the Story and more Quests.

I wish you all good Luck and Fun with all the amazing Games, that will be uploaded for the Contest.

best wishes Trivi
